summary: A group of young actors stay overnight in their host's castle only to be hunted by a serial killer.
cast: Marie Trintignant|Suzanne MacAleese|Maud Buquet|Alexia Stresi|Denis Lavant|Vincent Lecoeur|Michel Muller|François Berléand|Clotilde Courau|Clément Sibony|Thibault Truffert
title: Deep in the woods (En lo profundo del bosque)
